Source.Name: perl-variable-magic
Source.Summary: Variable::Magic - Associate user-defined magic to variables from Perl
Source.Description: Magic is Perl's way of enhancing variables. This mechanism lets the user add extra data to any variable and hook syntactical operations (such as access, assignment or destruction) that can be applied to it. With this module, you can add your own magic to any variable without having to write a single line of XS.
